content.rendered:
Flexible pricing for every stage of growth

Flexible pricing for every stage of growth

Build

Free

for 30 days

Developer-friendly sandbox where you can try out billing for free.

  • Fixed and usage-based billing

  • Product catalog

  • Customers and subscriptions

  • API endpoints

  • CRM and payment integrations

Try for free

see more details

Grow

$599 /month

up to $100k in monthly billings

Complete B2B subscription management platform with billing, revenue recognition, and reporting.

 

Everything you get in Build, plus:

  • Support for contract terms

  • Revenue recognition

  • SaaS metrics and analytics

  • One-click financial reports

  • Custom dashboards

  • Maxio Payments

  • Local support (EU and NA)

Get a demo

see more details

Scale

Get a Quote

with volume-based discounts

Tailored solution to support high billing volumes and advanced requirements.

 

Everything in the Grow plan, with the option to add on:

  • AR Management

  • Advanced Revenue Recognition

  • Expense amortization

  • Milestone-based billing and rev rec

  • Multi-entity support

Talk to sales

see more details

    Compare Plans

    Compare Plans

    Build Build

    Try for free

    Grow Grow

    Get a demo

    Scale Scale

    Talk to Sales

  • Our team is able to report on flash bookings within two days of month end, and we are able to close revenue within five days as a result of implementing Maxio.

    Antonietta Ciccone, Extensiv

    Director of Corporate Revenue Accounting

    Antonietta Ciccone, Extensiv

    Director of Corporate Revenue Accounting

    • Talk to us for a customized demo

    Do you have a complex business case, or just want to see Maxio in action? Schedule a demo to see for yourself how Maxio will streamline your company’s financial operations.

    Get a demo

    Pricing FAQs

    Yes! Our pricing is flexible based on contract term length.

    Our default agreements are paid annually, but we do offer premium options for monthly and quarterly payments.

    You can have as many users as you’d like at no additional charge!

    We’re dedicated to helping businesses of all sizes, so we offer very transparent pricing bands with add-ons and modules customized to your company’s needs.

excerpt.rendered: Our team is able to report on flash bookings within two days of month end, and we are able to close revenue within five days as a result of implementing Maxio. Antonietta Ciccone, Extensiv Director of Corporate Revenue Accounting Antonietta Ciccone, Extensiv Director of Corporate Revenue Accounting
